entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 p.m. MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
